article.content: The videos have already had ramifications for West Ham and for Zouma, who lost a major sponsorship deal with Adidas. Stefan Pursche, an Adidas spokesman, said in a statement on Wednesday that Zouma i… [+1075 chars]

article.author: Cameron Faulkner
article.title: This webcam is built different
article.description: It’s tough to pick the right webcam. There are many options, but few can actually deliver stunning video quality. Opal’s C1, a $300 webcam that has a waitlist, can. We go over this and a few other options that are worth your money.
article.content:
Why the Opal C1 is a great choice, plus some other options

article.author: Liam Reilly, CNN
article.title: Dashcam video leads to arrest in killing of Uber driver
article.description: An Uber driver found dead near Pittsburgh was robbed and killed by her passenger, with key moments of the incident recorded on the car's dash camera and leading to an arrest, according to a criminal complaint.
